name: A new Opensea
description:
OpenSea is the largest marketplace platform where users can buy, sell, and trade digital assets (NFTs), including artwork, music, videos, and other digital collectibles. OpenSea supports a variety of blockchains: Ethereum, Optimism, Solana, Arbitrum, Polygon, Blast, Base, Zora, and many more.

With over 9 million monthly visits and 2 million active users in 2024, OpenSea continues to maintain its position as a leader in the NFT space. This platform hosts millions of valuable NFT collections, attracting both creators and investors from around the world.

A new OpenSea is coming. December 2024.

Register Waitlist Now: https://opensea.io/waitlist
